mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT rownum as rnum, r.review_NO, s.shop_name, r.member_NO, p.pet_name, r.review_content, r.review_starscore, r.review_Date FROM t_review r INNER JOIN t_pet p ON r.member_NO = p.member_NO INNER JOIN t_shop s ON r.shop_no = s.shop_no where r.member_NO=#{member_NO} order by r.review_Date desc) where rnum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}

select * from ( SELECT rownum as rnum, r.review_NO, s.shop_name, r.member_NO, p.pet_name, r.review_content, r.review_starscore, r.review_Date FROM t_review r INNER JOIN t_pet p ON r.member_NO = p.member_NO INNER JOIN t_shop s ON r.shop_no = s.shop_no where r.member_NO=#{member_NO} order by r.review_Date desc) where rnum between 1 and 3
SELECT count(review_NO) from t_review where member_NO=#{member_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT into t_review(review_NO, member_NO, shop_NO, review_title, review_content, review_starScore) VALUES(seq_review.nextval, #{member_NO}, #{shop_NO}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{review_starScore})
